name: Sundial Growers Inc.
description: Sundial Growers Inc. is a Canadian licensed producer of cannabis, focusing on the cultivation and production of high-quality cannabis products. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Sundial operates state-of-the-art facilities designed to produce both recreational and medical cannabis. The company emphasizes innovation, sustainability, and quality in its operations, utilizing advanced agricultural techniques and technologies to optimize growth and yield. Sundial's product offerings include a range of dried flower, pre-rolls, and oils, catering to the evolving preferences of cannabis consumers. With a mission to elevate the cannabis experience, Sundial is committed to delivering exceptional products while fostering a responsible and informed approach to cannabis use. In recent years, Sundial has expanded its market presence through strategic partnerships and acquisitions, positioning itself as a competitive player in the rapidly growing cannabis industry. The company actively engages in community initiatives and advocates for the responsible use of cannabis, aiming to break down stigma and promote understanding of its benefits. As the legal cannabis market continues to evolve, Sundial is focused on expanding its product lines and enhancing its brand recognition across Canada and beyond.

seo.meta_title: Sundial Growers Inc. | Quality Cannabis Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Sundial Growers Inc., a leading Canadian cannabis producer. Discover our high-quality cannabis products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Sundial Growers produce?
faq.answer: Sundial Growers produces high-quality cannabis products, including dried flower and cannabis oils.

faq.question: Where is Sundial Growers located?
faq.answer: Sundial Growers is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Canada.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sundial Growers?
faq.answer: Zachary D. McFadden is the CEO of Sundial Growers Inc.
